ayahs.textUthmani: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَـٰذَآ أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَفَسِحْرٌ [Then is this magic] هَـٰذَآ [Then is this magic] أَمْ [or] أَنتُمْ [you] لَا [(do) not] تُبْصِرُونَ [see]

ayahs.textUthmani: ٱصْلَوْهَا فَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: ٱصْلَوْهَا [Burn in it] فَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ [then be patient] أَوْ [or] لَا [(do) not] تَصْبِرُوا۟ [be patient] سَوَآءٌ [(it is) same] عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ [for you] إِنَّمَا [Only] تُجْزَوْنَ [you are being recompensed] مَا [(for) what] كُنتُمْ [you used to] تَعْمَلُونَ [do]
ayahs.transliteration: Islawha fasbirooaw la tasbiroo sawaon AAalaykum innamatujzawna ma kuntum taAAmaloon

ayahs.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ [the righteous] فِى [(will be) in] جَنَّـٰتٍۢ [Gardens] وَنَعِيمٍۢ [and pleasure]

ayahs.textUthmani: فَـٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَـٰكِهِينَ [Enjoying] بِمَآ [in what] ءَاتَىٰهُمْ [has given them] رَبُّهُمْ [their Lord] وَوَقَىٰهُمْ [and protected them] رَبُّهُمْ [their Lord] عَذَابَ [(from the) punishment] ٱلْجَحِيمِ [(of) Hellfire]
ayahs.transliteration: Fakiheena bima atahumrabbuhum wawaqahum rabbuhum AAathaba aljaheem

ayahs.textUthmani: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: كُلُوا۟ [Eat] وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ [and drink] هَنِيٓـًٔۢا [(in) satisfaction] بِمَا [for what] كُنتُمْ [you used to] تَعْمَلُونَ [do]

ayahs.textUthmani: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّصْفُوفَةٍ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ [Reclining] عَلَىٰ [on] سُرُرٍۢ [thrones] مَّصْفُوفَةٍۢ ۖ [lined up] وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم [and We will marry them] بِحُورٍ [to fair ones] عِينٍۢ [(with) large eyes]
ayahs.transliteration: Muttaki-eena AAala sururin masfoofatinwazawwajnahum bihoorin AAeen

ayahs.textUthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَـٰنٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَآ أَلَتْنَـٰهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍ ۚ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَٱلَّذِينَ [And those who] ءَامَنُوا۟ [believed] وَٱتَّبَعَتْهُمْ [and followed them] ذُرِّيَّتُهُم [their offspring] بِإِيمَـٰنٍ [in faith] أَلْحَقْنَا [We will join] بِهِمْ [with them] ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ [their offspring] وَمَآ [and not] أَلَتْنَـٰهُم [We will deprive them] مِّنْ [of] عَمَلِهِم [their deeds] مِّن [(in) any] شَىْءٍۢ ۚ [thing] كُلُّ [Every] ٱمْرِئٍۭ [person] بِمَا [for what] كَسَبَ [he earned] رَهِينٌۭ [(is) pledged]
ayahs.transliteration: Wallatheena amanoo wattabaAAat-humthurriyyatuhum bi-eemanin alhaqnabihim thurriyyatahum wama alatnahum minAAamalihim min shay-in kullu imri-in bima kasaba raheen

ayahs.wordByWord: وَأَمْدَدْنَـٰهُم [And We will provide them] بِفَـٰكِهَةٍۢ [with fruit] وَلَحْمٍۢ [and meat] مِّمَّا [from what] يَشْتَهُونَ [they desire]

ayahs.textUthmani: يَتَنَـٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا لَّا لَغْوٌ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: يَتَنَـٰزَعُونَ [They will pass to one another] فِيهَا [therein] كَأْسًۭا [a cup] لَّا [no] لَغْوٌۭ [ill speech] فِيهَا [therein] وَلَا [and no] تَأْثِيمٌۭ [sin]
ayahs.transliteration: YatanazaAAoona feeha ka/san lalaghwun feeha wala ta/theem

words.translation: They will pass to one another

ayahs.textUthmani: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَّكْنُونٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ [And will circulate] عَلَيْهِمْ [among them] غِلْمَانٌۭ [boys] لَّهُمْ [for them] كَأَنَّهُمْ [as if they (were)] لُؤْلُؤٌۭ [pearls] مَّكْنُونٌۭ [well-protected]
ayahs.transliteration: Wayatoofu AAalayhim ghilmanunlahum kaannahum lu/luon maknoon

ayahs.wordByWord: وَأَقْبَلَ [And will approach] بَعْضُهُمْ [some of them] عَلَىٰ [to] بَعْضٍۢ [others] يَتَسَآءَلُونَ [inquiring]

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِىٓ أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالُوٓا۟ [They will say] إِنَّا [Indeed, we] كُنَّا [[we] were] قَبْلُ [before] فِىٓ [among] أَهْلِنَا [our families] مُشْفِقِينَ [fearful]
ayahs.transliteration: Qaloo inna kunna qablufee ahlina mushfiqeen

ayahs.textUthmani: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَمَنَّ [But Allah conferred favor] ٱللَّهُ [But Allah conferred favor] عَلَيْنَا [upon us] وَوَقَىٰنَا [and protected us] عَذَابَ [(from the) punishment] ٱلسَّمُومِ [(of) the Scorching Fire]

ayahs.textUthmani: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayahs.wordByWord: إِنَّا [Indeed, we] كُنَّا [[we] used to] مِن [before] قَبْلُ [before] نَدْعُوهُ ۖ [call Him] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, He] هُوَ [[He]] ٱلْبَرُّ [(is) the Most Kind] ٱلرَّحِيمُ [the Most Merciful]
ayahs.transliteration: Inna kunna min qablu nadAAoohuinnahu huwa albarru arraheem

ayahs.textUthmani: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَذَكِّرْ [Therefore remind] فَمَآ [for not] أَنتَ [you] بِنِعْمَتِ [(are) by (the) grace] رَبِّكَ [(of) your Lord] بِكَاهِنٍۢ [a soothsayer] وَلَا [and not] مَجْنُونٍ [a madman]
ayahs.transliteration: Fathakkir fama anta biniAAmatirabbika bikahin wala majnoon

ayahs.textUthmani: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيْبَ ٱلْمَنُونِ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] يَقُولُونَ [(do) they say] شَاعِرٌۭ [A poet] نَّتَرَبَّصُ [we wait] بِهِۦ [for him] رَيْبَ [a misfortune of time] ٱلْمَنُونِ [a misfortune of time]
ayahs.transliteration: Am yaqooloona shaAAirun natarabbasubihi rayba almanoon

ayahs.textUthmani: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا۟ فَإِنِّى مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] تَرَبَّصُوا۟ [Wait] فَإِنِّى [for indeed I am] مَعَكُم [with you] مِّنَ [among] ٱلْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ [those who wait]
